## Public Member Attributes

### mGroupSegmentFixedSize {#a2cdc6b690cc0517eb2cb99b4ea116ca3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>uint32&#95;t llvm::AMDGPU::HSAMD::Kernel::CodeProps::Metadata::mGroupSegmentFixedSize = 0</>}>
Size in bytes of the group segment memory required by a workgroup.

This value does not include any dynamically allocated group segment memory that may be added when the kernel is dispatched. Required.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/amdgpumetadata-h/#l00282">282</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/amdgpumetadata-h">AMDGPUMetadata.h</a>.
